roles.name: Cost Administrator
roles.description: A cost management administrator role that grants read and write permissions.

roles.name: Cost Price List Administrator
roles.description: A cost management role that grants read and write permissions on price list rates.

roles.name: Cost Cloud Viewer
roles.description: A cost management role that grants read permissions on cost reports related to cloud sources.

roles.name: Cost OpenShift Viewer
roles.description: A cost management role that grants read permissions on cost reports related to OpenShift sources.
